metadata.title: CVE-2024-56688 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:sunrpc: clear XPRT_SOCK_UPD_TIMEOUT when reset transportSince transport->sock has been set to NULL during reset transport,XPRT_SOCK_UPD_TIMEOUT also needs to be cleared. Otherwise, thexs_tcp_set_socket_timeouts() may be triggered in xs_tcp_send_request()to dereference the transport->sock that has been set to NULL.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-18.18').
